Posts.Content: It is against the law for health insurance companies to use genetic testing to determine benefits. https://ghr.nlm.nih.gov/primer/testing/discrimination https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Genetic_Information_Nondiscrimination_Act
Posts.Title: Gene testing, precision medicine, and shared information

Posts.Content: You have to be careful because many people do not like seeing posts unrelated to their forum all the time. There is a "Hide" option now that will hide any post that you get tired of seeing. Good health to you.
Posts.Title: Inspire's Amazing Ability To Share In Multiple Groups
